name: Commander

skills.name: Holy Fire
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 15% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 6 Damage +10%
Lvl. 7 Damage +10%
Lvl. 8 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

skills.name: Quickheal
skills.raw_description:
Heals the ally with the lowest HP by 40% of this Champion's HP. Completely fills the target's Turn Meter if the ally is fully healed. This Champion's Turn Meter cannot be filled by this Skill.
Lvl. 2 Heal +5%
Lvl. 3 Heal +5%
Lvl. 4 Heal +5%
Lvl. 5 Heal +10%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 7 Cooldown -1

seo.description: Banner-Lords is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 33 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

faction.raw_description: Hereditary Knights of Kaerok, the Banner Lords swear blindallegiance to King Tayba. His majesty has tasked them withwaging his war of expansion, and protecting the royaladministrators posted at Kaerok Castle. These fearsome knightswill let no soul pass without a royal scroll.
